name: Dens
description:
Dens

Dens will be an action-adventure game that tells a story about loneliness, depression and anxiety. This is an early prototype for the game, and is planned to become a hack and slash demo showcasing the combat mechanic for Dens, and using the same art.

At this stage, there is basic movement for the main character and a placeholder attack and one passive enemy, with original art for both as well as the environment.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

F - Attack
